## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G22350](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G22350)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ELM1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ELONGATED MITOCHONDRIA 1
- **Description:**   fission ELM1-like protein (DUF1022);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G22350.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G22350.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_071234]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;homozygotes show elongated mitochondria
   - [elm1-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Slow growing and slightly smaller than WT. Early bolting. Severely elongated mitochondria, often forming an interconnected network. Some small, discrete mitochondria are found in each cell. Mitochondrial movement is normal.
   - [elm1-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Elongated mitochondria
   - [elm1-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Elongated mitochondria
   - [elm1-4]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Elongated mitochondria
   - [elm1-5]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Elongated mitochondria

   - [Cold Treatment Induces Transient Mitochondrial Fragmentation in Arabidopsis  thaliana in a Way that Requires DRP3A but not ELM1 or an ELM1-Like Homologue,  ELM2.](https://www.doi.org/10.3390/ijms18102161)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.3390/ijms18102161](https://www.doi.org/10.3390/ijms18102161);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[29039787](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29039787/)
